Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes a commission on hosting the olympic games
Summary: Establishes a commission on Lake Placid and a partner municipality hosting the olympic games.
LawCode: Add ยง2611-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing a commission on hosting the olympic games
